title: Looking for ranked partner (low elo climb)
body:
Im trying to climb through silver, by just using the same champions (good team fighting champions) and trying to carry games, which has been working, but I just want someone else in my game that I can rely on. My 2 roles are mid and jungle. If you are serious about climbing and just want to win games and just stick with what you know add me. 

Uncle Pip

replies.body: was s4 3 days before now b1, cant help it so many cry babies if they get auto fill (sup) and troll well nvm if u wana play  msg me, I have added you
